title: Bugsplat error and nothing on the web fixes it
body:
Hey! I'm gettin bugsplat crashes after every championpick, as soon as the championselect are done and the icon comes up it just crashes with bugsplat.
The game don't even start or get to the screen where you are suppose to  see the champions.

I have tried the Logitech solution, i have tried reinstalling, repairing, changing location of the install, i have tried radsproblem, and there's nothing that works...!

It's my girlfriend that wants to play, I'm just trying to help her beein able to play again, but seriously, im all out of ideas... There's such a limited section to search on for this kind of problem.

And what i don't understand is that reinstalling and such does not help.. It's the same problem everytime in the debuglog

It crashes due to : Read from location 0000000 caused and access violation.
It's the same everytime i'v tried a solution.

She could play 2 days ago, but after an Nvidia update on graphics drivers, she gets that crash everytime.. Haven't played a single game since.

Please help me solve this.

Kind Regards Bjorn from Sweden

replies.body:
What OS are you on?

Have you tried running League with heightened privileges?
This is also happening to me! I need help D:
